author: James Joyce
text: I can give you a Roland for your Oliver. I wrote a letter to Hone as I told you. The following arrived from Roberts: [‘]⁠We have gone carefully into the matter and think that the best way out of the deadlock would be for you to offer the printed sheets to Grant Richards. You stated that his printer would not print the book. This would be obviated by his taking over the sheets printed by us.[’] Let me hear what you think of this. Of Padua I understand nothing. The sooner you convince yourself that I am pursued by scalogna the better. I wrote to Field for Price and send you the result. Am writing to the Board of Education in London to know why a British degree in arts is not recognised as valid for examination purposes in Italy. This is the only thing I can think of doing as yet. As for Dubliners … Jim
